articles.title: Animal Crossing PSA: You Should Be Catching Tarantulas This Week - GameSpot
articles.description: This week is your last chance to catch tarantulas before they go out of season in May, so act fast!
articles.content:
If you have a Northern Hemisphere island in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, this week is your last chance to catch tarantulas before they go out of season in May. The last day to catch tarantulas will be Thursday, April 30.
For many players, the eight-legged … [+2661 chars]

articles.description: That's right: if you download the game on Steam between today (April 27) and May 1, it'll be yours forever -- or, at least until the day Steam shuts down, which is hopefully a long way off. Total War: Shogun…
articles.content: Freebies: Everyone loves free stuff, and that's something Sega understands quite well, if the company's latest promotional stunt is anything to go by. Starting today, the fantastic feudal Japan-themed strategy title Total War: Shogun 2 will be completely free… [+1389 chars]

articles.author: Michael Kan
articles.title: Microsoft Teams Patches Flaw to Stop GIF-Based Attacks - PCMag AU
articles.description: Researchers at CyberArk used an internet meme to steal user data from people using Microsoft Teams, including messages sent over the platform. Redmond has since patched the bug.
articles.content:
Security researchers have uncovered a flaw in Microsoft Teams that enabled them to steal messages from user accounts by sending a malicious GIF image. 
Security firm CyberArk demonstrated the attack in a video released Monday. Its researchers used the intern… [+2441 chars]

articles.title: Overwatch League tries to galvanize interest with a May Madness tournament - Engadget
articles.description: Teams will battle in two regional tournaments for prize money and bonus wins towards their season records.
articles.content: So far in 2020, teams have been playing for their season records. Games over the first three weekends of May will still count towards overall win-loss records. Actual tournament matches won’t, but the top four squads in each region will earn bonus wins toward… [+1569 chars]

articles.title: Students surprise teacher after play was cancelled - KTNV Channel 13 Las Vegas
articles.description: Facebook is taking on Zoom with a new video conference app. It will be called "Messenger Rooms" and it will allow users to host a meeting of up to 50 people.
